title: COUNTING MECHANISMS; COUNTING OF OBJECTS NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR  (counting by measuring volume or weight of articles to be counted G01F, G01G; computers G06C - G06J; counting electric pulses H03K; counting characters, words or messages in switching networks for transmission of digital information H04L12/08)
informative_references: Inhalers incorporating mechanisms for counting actuations Tariff metering apparatus Indicating or recording devices in volume flow meters
special_rules: Subject-matter classified in , , and  should also be classified in the relevant sub-group of  if the means detecting the objects counted are of particular relevance.
definition_statement: This place covers: Stepping or continuously-moving mechanical counters operated through one or more inputs applied to the lowest order mechanically or electrically. Counting systems involving applications of either mechanical, electrical, or electronic counters.

title: Counting of objects carried by a conveyor
definition_statement: This place covers: Counting of randomly distributed loose objects moving past a counting station, like in chute conveyors.

title: Counting of objects distributed at random, e.g. on a surface
definition_statement: This place covers: Counting of objects in a static distribution.
